meta.name: description
meta.content:
Arkansas City Public Schools is a results-producing public school district. Our district holds a tradition of excellence in all matters related to student achievement and true, well-rounded education. Ark City students have been on the front lines of achievement and continue the tradition of exceeding learning targets suggested by the state.
USD 470 is committed to excellence in teaching and learning for all students. We will provide effective instructional leadership and quality learning environments that promote improved student outcomes. Our district holds high expectations for students and staff. We share with the community the responsibility for educating all students so they will be prepared to live, work, and continue learning how to learn in an ever-changing world.

div.h4: UPDATED - Kids Eat Free Posted Date: 03/27/2020
div.p: In an effort to help ensure children in our community have what they need, we are offering FREE grab-n-go meals while school is canceled due to COVID-19 concerns. . . .

div.h4: Ark City home to FEMA-approved storm shelters Posted Date: 03/18/2020
div.p: We want to remind you that we have have FEMA-approved storm shelters at each of our elementary schools . . .

div.h4: How to Retrieve Your Child's Personal Items From School Posted Date: 03/25/2020
div.p: Your child’s personal belongings are being prepared for you to pick-up this week. Each level is handling it differently, so please view this page for more information. Thank . . .

div.h4: Answers to frequently asked questions about school closure and continuous learning Posted Date: 03/21/2020
div.p: While we are still sorting out many details, we wanted to touch base and share the answers to some of our most frequently asked questions. . . .

USD 470 Families,
We know Governor Kelly’s announcement temporarily closing schools had a significant impact on everyone. We know parents, students and families have questions about what that . . .

div.h4: COVID-19 Update: Governor orders school closed for remainder of school year Posted Date: 03/17/2020
div.p: Though schools buildings are closed, unique learning opportunities are being designed . . .
We are continually adding parent updates, information, and helpful resources on our website at www.usd470.com/coronavirus. . . .
